title: Menactra 0.5ML Inj 1x1 (P)
details: It is used to treat meningococcal infections in adults and children.
precautions: Use with caution having history of serious allergic reaction (Anaphylaxis) to vaccine components or Encephalopathy (Coma or prolonged seizures).
effects: Injection site reactions (pain, swelling and redness), fever and shivering.
